name: power-split
flavor_text: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.
effect_text_extend:
Averages the user's unmodified Attack with the target's unmodified Attack; the value becomes the unmodified Attack for both Pok√©mon. Unmodified Special Attack is averaged the same way.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as flower gift during sunny day.
effect_text_simple: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.
